component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: cash and cash+BCC in the north, as well as food+BCC in the south, led to significant sustained increases in consumption and reductions in poverty

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Our exploration of mechanisms suggests possible explanations for these findings. In the north, cash+BCC led to sustained increases in asset accumulation, particularly of livestock and savings. Cash+BCC also led to sustained increases in women's labor supply to agriculture.

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Four years after TMRI ended, cash and cash+BCC in the north, as well as food+BCC in the south
